subject: Overusing a new tool (was: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit with Selenium-RC how 	to)
msgSnippet: On Tue, Feb 24, 2009 at 9:15 AM, Joshua Kerievsky ... Or, do overuse it, knowing that you re overusing it, and expecting to pull back once you ve learned the
messageBody:
On Tue, Feb 24, 2009 at 9:15 AM, Joshua Kerievsky
<jlk@...>wrote:

> It also bears mentioning that we use Se for testing UI-specific stuff, not
> domain logic. As always, when learning a new tool, be careful not to
> overuse it.


Or, do overuse it, knowing that you're overusing it, and expecting to pull
back once you've learned the limits. That's my usual strategy. :-)

David Saff


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
